name: Notah
description: An AI-powered note-taking app, which allows users to write prompts and receive text outputs from the GPT model directly in their note.
more: Utilized OpenAI API to integrate generative AI. Built a clean and efficient UI/UX using React and Tailwind. Developed a backend REST API with ASP.NET (C#) which communicates with a PostgreSQL database.

name: PokéChamp
description: A platform for Pokémon trainers to create and share their favorite Pokémon party.
more: Utilized PokéAPI to display Pokémon data such as image, name, type. Developed a backend server with NodeJS and Express which communicates with a MongoDB database. Implemented user authentication using JWT.

name: Must Play Game Predictor
description: A predictive model which identifies whether a video game should be classified as a Must Play game based on its reviews on Metacritic.
more: Built the model using text preprocessing and logistic regression against a Kaggle dataset with 5K games and 284K user reviews. The model achieved a prediction accuracy of 65.52% on test data.

name: Flightimizer
description: An application that recommends users the fastest flight from a source to a destination airport utilizing Dijkstra's algorithm.
more: Constructed a directed graph from a Kaggle dataset with 578K flight data, where edges are weighed by elapsed flight time.
